feed.title: Linkwarden Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Linkwarden: v2.8.0
entry.content:
Announcing Linkwarden 2.8

Read the full blog: https://blog.linkwarden.app/releases/2.8

Whatâ€™s new:

ğŸ–¼ï¸ Custom Preview Image

Allows users to set a specific preview image for links, making them more visually distinctive and personalized.

ğŸ¨ Custom Icons for Links and Collections

Thanks to Phosphor Icons, users can now assign unique icons to both individual Links and Collections, each with thousands of unique combinations.

â„¹ï¸ New Link Details Drawer

We added a new drawer to display a full view of Link Details, Preserved Formats, and Additional information.

ğŸ› ï¸ Customizable View and Adjustable Columns

You can now customize what to view and adjust the number of columns in the Linkwarden dashboard.

ğŸ”„ Browser Synchronization

Special thanks to Marcel from Floccus, you can now sync your browser bookmarks with Linkwarden using Floccus.

  • Floccus GitHub Repository
  • Floccus Chrome Extension
  • Floccus Firefox Add-on

â†—ï¸ Open all Links under a Collection

Allows users to open all links under a collection in a new tab.

ğŸŒ Added many more Translations

Thanks to all the contributors, we now support the following languages to make Linkwarden accessible to a broader, global audience:

  • ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡¼ Chinese - Taiwan (zh-TW)
  • ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡± Dutch (nl)
  • ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡ª German (de)
  • ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ Japanese (ja)
  • ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡· Portuguese - Brazil (pt-BR)
  • ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡¸ Spanish (es)
  • ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡· Turkish (tr)
  • ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Ukrainian (uk)

ğŸ‘¥ Reserve more Seats

Cloud subscribers can now add more seats and invite users who arenâ€™t on Linkwarden from their billing page. Learn more about managing seats in our documentation.

ğŸ”— Editable Link URL's

Users can now directly edit link addresses without needing to create a new entry.

ğŸ³ Smaller Docker Image

The Docker image size has been reduced by around 50%, optimizing storage usage and making deployment faster.

âœ… And more...

Check out the full changelog below.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/linkwarden/linkwarden/compare/v2.7.1...v2.8.0

ğŸ”— External Links

Website: https://linkwarden.app/

GitHub: https://github.com/linkwarden/linkwarden

entry.title: New release for Linkwarden: v2.8.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • bug fix by @daniel31x13 in https://github.com/linkwarden/linkwarden/pull/831
  • updated README by @daniel31x13 in https://github.com/linkwarden/linkwarden/pull/834
  • minor change by @daniel31x13 in https://github.com/linkwarden/linkwarden/pull/835
  • bug fix by @daniel31x13 in https://github.com/linkwarden/linkwarden/pull/837
  • added status badges by @daniel31x13 in https://github.com/linkwarden/linkwarden/pull/838
  • Corrected Ukrainian translation for November 12, 2024 by @click0 in https://github.com/linkwarden/linkwarden/pull/833
  • Dev by @daniel31x13 in https://github.com/linkwarden/linkwarden/pull/839
  • Dev by @daniel31x13 in https://github.com/linkwarden/linkwarden/pull/840
  • update version number by @daniel31x13 in https://github.com/linkwarden/linkwarden/pull/841
  • revert dockerfile to working state by @daniel31x13 in https://github.com/linkwarden/linkwarden/pull/845
  • update Dockerfile by @daniel31x13 in https://github.com/linkwarden/linkwarden/pull/846
  • increase staticPageGenerationTimeout by @daniel31x13 in https://github.com/linkwarden/linkwarden/pull/849

Full Changelog: https://github.com/linkwarden/linkwarden/compare/v2.8.0...v2.8.1

entry.title: New release for Linkwarden: v2.8.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fixed placeholder in german translation by @clemenstyp in https://github.com/linkwarden/linkwarden/pull/867
  • fix(monolith): quote url by @keizie in https://github.com/linkwarden/linkwarden/pull/896
  • 2.8.3 french translation by @Go-rom in https://github.com/linkwarden/linkwarden/pull/885
  • Dev by @daniel31x13 in https://github.com/linkwarden/linkwarden/pull/898
  • minor fix by @daniel31x13 in https://github.com/linkwarden/linkwarden/pull/899

New Contributors

  • @clemenstyp made their first contribution in https://github.com/linkwarden/linkwarden/pull/867
  • @keizie made their first contribution in https://github.com/linkwarden/linkwarden/pull/896
  • @Go-rom made their first contribution in https://github.com/linkwarden/linkwarden/pull/885

Full Changelog: https://github.com/linkwarden/linkwarden/compare/v2.8.3...v2.8.4
